Class GameLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.educationallydesigned.thyme.core.levels.GameLevel

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeficiencyRoom, EscapeRoom, PanicRoom

    public abstract class GameLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Game that contains all the methods that all levels have. Time Spent:
    • Theodore - 120 min
    • Larry - 20min
